At PayPal (NASDAQ: PYPL), we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy. Our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone, regardless of background or economic standing, has access to affordable, convenient, and secure products and services to take control of their financial lives.
Job Description Summary: What you need to know about the role: We are looking for a Risk Analyst is to develop PayPal’s Risk strategy within Consumer Risk portfolio. This portfolio is comprised of PayPal’s newest leading-edge payments solutions as well as customized experiences developed for the company’s highest-priority strategic partnerships. The team is also responsible for partnering with the corresponding Business Units to align with and influence their strategic priorities, educate business partners about Risk management principles, and collaboratively optimize the Risk treatments and experiences for these unique products and partners. Each Data Scientist in this team has full ownership of a sub-portfolio of merchants/ countries/ products and is responsible for end-to-end management of loss and decline rate strategies. Day-to-day duties include data analysis, monitoring and forecasting, creating the risk decision logic using BigData/Hadoop tools and implementing risk rules/ strategies using Analytics techniques such as Decision Tree, providing requirements to AI/ML modeling and technology teams on attribute, model and platform requirements, and communicating with global stakeholders to ensure we deliver the best possible customer experience while meeting loss rate targets. If you’re interested in working with PayPal’s most interesting payments experiences, then this is the right team for to join!

Visualizing data for deeper insights
